meta.@content: HAnim skeletal structure for Level of Action (LOA) one, with diamonds at the Joint centers. LOA-1 is typical low-end real-time 3D hierarchy.
(a) "Diamonds are a girl's best friend." (b) "Gosh, it sure is chilly in here."
Still needs comments on CAESAR feature points inserted
HAnim 1.1 specification, Appendix A: Suggested Body Dimensions and Levels of Articulation, Level of Articulation Two

@info: HAnim 2.0 Default Joint Centers, Level Of Articulation (LOA) 1 -------------------------------------------------------- HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Author name: eMpTy (a.k.a. Matthew T. Beitler) HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Author email: beitler@graphics.cis.upenn.edu or beitler@acm.org HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Author homepage: http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~beitler HANIM 1.1 (VRML 2.0) Compliance Date: May 12, 1999 HANIM 1.1 Compliance Information: http://ece.uwaterloo.ca/~HAnim/ Construction Info (joint centers): The joint centers of this figure are based on the work of Norman Badler, director of the Center for Human Modeling and Simulation at the University of Pennsylvania. The original document which these joint centers are based on can be found at: http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~badler/anthro/89-71.ps, .pdf
